name: hidden_directories
pattern: {"query": "SELECT hash.sha1, fi.path, fi.filename, datetime(fi.btime, 'unixepoch', 'UTC') as btime, datetime(fi.atime, 'unixepoch', 'UTC') as atime, datetime(fi.ctime, 'unixepoch', 'UTC') as ctime, datetime(fi.mtime, 'unixepoch', 'UTC') as mtime FROM hash JOIN file fi USING (path) where ((fi.path like '/home/%%/.%') OR (fi.path like '/root/.%')) AND type='directory';", "interval": 3600, "description": "Lists hidden direcotry in relevant path - ATT&CK T1158"}
